thread.title: Dollar Rises on Monetary Policy Signals
thread.title_full: Dollar Rises on Monetary Policy Signals - WSJ

author: James Ramage
title: Dollar Rises on Monetary Policy Signals
text:
The dollar strengthened broadly Friday as recent central-bank signals underscored that the Federal Reserve would raise interest rates while many others remained on a path of easy monetary policy in the coming months.
The dollar rose 1% against the euro, as the common currency bought $1.1002, its lowest against the greenback since Aug. 11. Over the past week, the euro shed 3.1%. The dollar increased 0.6% versus the yen to Â¥121.42, a... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
